title: Speedy chicken and corn quesadilla
ingredients: ['1 small onion, sliced', 'olive oil spray', '3 heaped tablespoons frozen sweetcorn', '125g sliced cooked chicken', '1 to 2 large pickled jalapeno, sliced', '1/2 teaspoon cayenne pepper', '1/4 teaspoon oregano', 'salt and pepper to taste', '2 flour tortillas', '1 heaped tablespoon tomato puree', '60g grated mature cheese']
